title: Space Force to create “integrated” units responsible for acquisition, maintenance and operations
summary: Gen. Chance Saltzman announced the Space Force will experiment with a new command structure where a unit is responsible for all aspects of a mission area, including training, procurement and operations.

title: Phase Four demonstrates Maxwell Block 2 thruster in orbit
summary: Phase Four’s Maxwell Block 2 radio-frequency thruster has been demonstrated on a commercial satellite.

title: Intelsat plotting a MEO constellation in 2027 with C-band windfall
summary: Intelsat expects to decide whether to proceed with plans for a medium Earth orbit constellation early next year after requesting proposals from nine satellite makers, an executive for the geostationary fleet operator said Sept. 12.

title: Axiom Space Announces International Crew Of Axiom 3 Mission
summary: This morning, NASA and its international partners cleared the crew of 4 who will fly aboard Crew Dragon early next year as part of the Axiom 3 mission, operated by Axiom Space.

title: NASA Sets Coverage for Launch, Docking of New Space Station Crew
summary: A NASA astronaut and two Roscosmos cosmonauts are set to launch to the International Space Station on Friday, Sept. 15. The U.S. space agency will provide full coverage of launch and crew’s arrival at the microgravity laboratory.
